snippet.title: Roguelands v1.0 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an epic journey in this hardcore Multiplayer RPG! As a Galactic Cadet, you and your Combat Squad of friends must brave hostile worlds in search of valuable loot and resources. Craft powerful gear, slay otherworldly creatures, and save the galaxy.

Roguelands on Steam
http://store.steampowered.com/app/364420/

SPECIAL THANKS to these youtubers who own the clips in this video:

nolic0321
https://www.youtube.com/user/nolic0321

https://www.youtube.com/user/3eetle

Modi Operandus
https://www.youtube.com/user/modioperandus

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxOb66aqbjlsX9wVCN8wzaQ

alexrol1988
https://www.youtube.com/user/alexrol1988vids

TheGullOfDoom
https://www.youtube.com/user/TheGullofdoom

Joziah2 and Stealth384
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8cnHS3Ub_EEzuaESD8E-ow

Wanderbots
https://www.youtube.com/user/wanderbots

flame101
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEHeKhFP9OOzGxc6m_T9AvQ

Check out their channels and GO BUY THIS GAME ON STEAM.
-Sean

https://twitter.com/SeanYoungSG
